title: Mercury square Uranus
summary: Mercury collides with Uranian disruption, creating sudden friction between comfort and change. Plans may be interrupted to make room for a needed pivot. Agility matters more than control.

meaning.headline: Shocks challenge thinking and messaging to adapt fast.

frames.text: Uranus themes influence thinking and messaging, shifting default patterns.
Expect movement; adaptability matters more than certainty.
There is room to experiment with how you respond.
Signals may arrive quickly; small, conscious steps keep you oriented.
A dramatic event is guaranteed to happen.

frictions: Restlessness that makes routine feel stifling
Overreacting to constraints with abrupt exits
Scattered focus from chasing every new signal
opportunities: Spotting the experiment that can refresh a stale pattern
Welcoming surprises as data rather than threats
Testing a bold idea in a contained way
Choosing authenticity even if it breaks a minor rule
Updating habits quickly once a better option appears

do: Give yourself one safe place to try the unconventional move first
Document changes so quick shifts stay coordinated
Share the "why" behind a pivot to reduce shock for others
Leave room in the schedule for interruptions and insights
Ground the breakthrough with one immediate, practical step
avoid: Burning bridges just to feel free
Using chaos as a shortcut to avoid discomfort

reusable_lines.text: Breakthroughs land best when you ground the shock in one clear action.
Not every shake-up is a threat; some are invitations to refresh the pattern.

forbidden_claims: Promises of sudden success or disaster
Deterministic claims about accidents or breakups
Assumptions that change will be permanent or total
allowed_framing: Agency and choice under rapid change
Process framing about experimenting and iterating
Conditional language about openings and pivots
